message_1: A car manufacturing company wants to compare the fuel efficiency of three different car models. They randomly select 10 cars of each model and record their miles per gallon (MPG). Using ANOVA, can you determine if there is a significant difference in the mean MPG among the three car models? Use a significance level of 0.05.
message_2: To perform an ANOVA test to determine if there is a significant difference in the mean MPG among the three car models, we need the data for the 10 cars of each model. Please provide the MPG data for each car model.
